constituent: brandish, finger, fingers, army, chariot, crown, car, vehicle
koohiiStory1: A military leader in his chariot is brandishing his finger at the enemy, crying "chaaaaaaaaarrrgggeeee!".
koohiiStory2: Think of the movie Gladiator but instead Maximus is brandishing a giant foam brand name (nike, rebok, adidas, whatever) finger like you see at a baseball game. He´s riding in a chariot using the foam finger to kill his enemy.
myStory: vung. tung. tay trong quân đội để vung vũ khí
